sentence.Network_en: Margaret took me to one side, holding my arm in a gentle caress.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛格丽特将我拉到一边，轻轻地抚摸着我的胳膊。

sentence.Network_en: But when she tried to caress him, the boy shunned her.
sentence.Network_cn: 可是当她底手去抚摸他底时候, 他又躲闪开了.

sentence.Network_en: But who will understand me and caress away my tears?
sentence.Network_cn: 不过谁能了解我,抱我,抚慰我 呢 !

list.abs: as Francisca and I farewells at the airport , I caressed her cheek .法兰西丝卡在机场和我道别的时候，我摸摸她的双颊。
Do you feel the breeze caressing your face ?, 你感到微风在抚摸你的脸颊吗?
法术-自然守护者... ... 野性眷顾 Favour of the Untamed 自然关怀 Nature's caress 罗威尔的溪谷之形 Rowyl's Form of the Vale.
softly , deftly music shall caress you ., 轻柔灵巧地 , 音乐将抚慰你.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French caresser (verb), caresse (noun), from Italian carezza, based on Latin carus 'dear'

entry.def: If you caress someone, you stroke them gently and affectionately.

example.ex: He was gently caressing her golden hair.
example.tran: 他深情抚摸着她的金发。

means.word_mean: 1. a gentle affectionate stroking (or something resembling it);

sentences.sentence: "the caresses of the breeze played over his face"

means.word_mean: 1. touch or stroke lightly in a loving or endearing manner;

sentences.sentence: "They caressed in the back seat of the taxi"

auth_sentence.content: You just want to caress people in the morning.
auth_sentence.res_content: You just want to caress people in the morning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You just want to caress people in the morning.

auth_sentence.content: Why does Mr. Campos never caress her breasts anymore?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why does Mr. Campos never caress her breasts anymore?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why does Mr. Campos never caress her breasts anymore?

auth_sentence.content: There are master drummers who prefer to carefully caress their kits.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are master drummers who prefer to carefully caress their kits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are master drummers who prefer to carefully caress their kits.

sentences.cn: 她深情地抚摸着他的面颊。

jushi.english: Grandmother gave each of us a kiss and a caress.
jushi.chinese: 奶奶轻轻抱着我们每人亲一下。

jushi.english: He exerted himself to win by indulgence and caresses the hearts of those who were under his command.
jushi.chinese: 他尽力靠恩惠和甜言蜜语赢得下属的心。

jushi.english: She melted under the warmth of his caresses.
jushi.chinese: 她在他的爱抚下熔化了。
